Member Function Documentation

void GPSReceiver::update (  ) 

Check the serial port handler for new lines and parse any GGRMC sentences.

This function updates the class's internal state. You should always call update() before accessing class members.

unsigned int GPSReceiver::parse_until_comma ( char *  input,
char *  output,
unsigned int  position 
) [private]

Read input until a comma occurs, storing each characater into output.

Sets output to be a null terminated string of everything up to the comma. Returns the new position for next time the function is called.

Parameters:
input A char* pointing to a null terminated string
output A char* pointing to a buffer that must be as big as input
position The previous position in the string, i.e. the starting point
